Description: OpenAI publicly announced as nonprofit AI lab.
Tesla rolls out first Autopilot features to customers.
Model 3 reveal; hundreds of thousands of reservations follow.
Neuralink founded (incorporation date).
SolarCity board accepts Tesla’s acquisition offer.
Tesla completes ~$2B acquisition of SolarCity.
Musk starts tunnel venture The Boring Company.
Tesla hands over first 30 Model 3 cars.
Tesla debuts electric semi-truck and next-gen Roadster.
First Falcon Heavy launch; Tesla Roadster as dummy payload.
Tweets intent to take Tesla private at $420; sparks SEC action.
Musk agrees to step down as Tesla chair, pay $20M fine.
SpaceX launches first 60 Starlink satellites.
Tesla unveils Cybertruck; window demo mishap goes viral.

Event: Wins Thai cave diver defamation case
Description: Jury finds Musk not liable in ‘pedo guy’ defamation suit.
Calls lockdowns 'fascist' during Tesla earnings call.
Tesla joins the S&P 500 index.
SEC filing reveals Tesla cryptocurrency purchase.
Musk hosts SNL, boosting public profile and Dogecoin chatter.
First all-civilian orbital mission by SpaceX.

Event: Tesla HQ move to Texas announced
Description: Musk says Tesla is moving HQ from California to Texas.
Musk offers to buy Twitter for ~$44B.
Twitter accepts Musk’s $44B offer.
Musk seeks to back out of acquisition; legal battle ensues.
Deal closes; Musk takes control of Twitter.
X/Twitter cuts roughly half of staff.
X/Twitter suspends reporters covering Musk.
First Tesla Semi trucks delivered to PepsiCo.
First Starship test flight; vehicle lost after liftoff.
Musk launches xAI to build AGI-aligned systems.
Musk signals rebrand from Twitter to X.
The blue bird is replaced by the X logo.
Second Starship test; stages separate; vehicle lost later.
xAI announces Grok chatbot integrated with X.
Brands pause ads amid content moderation concerns.
Tesla delivers first Cybertrucks at Texas event.
Chancery Court strikes down Musk’s 2018 compensation plan.
Starship achieves more milestones; reentry loss.
Starship completes near-orbital test with splashdowns.
Shareholders back Musk pay package and move to Texas incorporation.
EU opens formal DSA probe into X’s content moderation.
xAI announces all-stock deal to acquire X (formerly Twitter).
11th Starship test achieves planned splashdowns.

Event: SEC sues over late Twitter disclosure
Description: SEC alleges Musk failed to timely disclose 2022 Twitter stake.
